message: I understand you want to be fair, but this time my turn. Let's make a deal!
Come on, meet me in the middle!
I'm happy to meet in the middle, but let's be realistic.  Time is running out!
You're right, time is running out. Let's compromise a bit more.
We need to settle this now. This is my final offer.
I know you said that was your final offer, but I'm willing to take a little more risk.
